jaþþans afwandei.

2TIM 3.6 unte us þaim sind þaiei sliupand in gardins jah frahunþana tiuhand qineina afhlaþana frawaurhtim, þoei tiuhanda du lustum missaleikaim, 2TIM 3.7 sinteino laisjandona sik janni aiw ƕanhun in ufkunþja sunjos qiman mahteiga.
2TIM 3.8 aþþan þamma haidau ei Jannes jah Mamres andstoþun Moseza, swa jah þai andstandand sunjai, mannans frawaurþanai ahin, uskusanai bi galaubein;
2TIM 3.9 akei ni þeihand du filusnai, unte unwiti ize swikunþ wairþiþ allaim, swaswe jah jainaize was.
2TIM 3.10 iþ þu galaista is laiseinai meinai, usmeta, muna, , galaubeinai, usbeisnai, frijaþwai, þulainai, 2TIM 3.11 wrakjom, wunnim, ƕileika mis waurþun in Antiaukiai, in Eikaunion, in Lwstrws,
ƕileikos wrakjos usþulaida, jah us allaim mik galausida frauja.
2TIM 3.12 jah þan allai þaiei wileina gagudaba liban in Xristau Iesu, wrakos winnand.
2TIM 3.13 iþ ubilai mannans jah liutai þeihand du wairsizin, airzjai jah airzjandans.

2TIM 3.14 iþ þu framwairþis wisais in þaimei galaisides þuk jah gatrauaida sind þus, witands at ƕamma ganamt, 2TIM 3.15 jah þatei us barniskja weihos bokos kunþes, þos mahteigons þuk usfratwjan du ganistai þairh galaubein þo in Xristau Iesu.

2TIM 3.16 all boko gudiskaizos ahmateinais jah þaurftos du laiseinai, du gasahtai, du garaihteinai, du talzeinai in garaihtein, 2TIM 3.17 ei ustauhans sijai manna gudis, du allamma waurstwe godaize gamanwiþs.
2TIM 4.1 Weitwodja in andwairþja gudis jah fraujins Xristaus Iesuis, saei skal stojan qiwans jah dauþans bi qum is jah þiudinassu is:
2TIM 4.2 merei waurd,
instand uhteigo unuhteigo,
gasak,
gaþlaih,
gaƕotei in allai usbeisnai jah laiseinai.
2TIM 4.3 wairþiþ mel þan haila laisein ni usþuland, ak du seinaim lustum gadragand sis laisarjans, suþjandans hausein; 2TIM 4.4 aþþan af sunjai hausein afwandjand, iþ du spillam gawandjand sik.
2TIM 4.5 iþ þu andaþahts sijais in allaim,
arbaidei,
waurstw waurkei aiwaggelistins,
andbahti þein usfullei.
2TIM 4.6 aþþan ik ju hunsljada jah mel meinaizos diswissais atist.
2TIM 4.7 haifst þo godon haifstida,
run ustauh,
galaubein gafastaida;
2TIM 4.8 þaþroh galagiþs ist mis waips garaihteins, þanei usgibiþ mis frauja in jainamma daga, sa garaihta staua; aþþan ni þatainei mis, ak jah allaim þaiei frijond qum is.
2TIM 4.9 sniumei qiman at mis sprauto;
2TIM 4.10 unte Demas mis bilaiþ, frijonds þo nu ald, jaggalaiþ du Þaissalauneikai,
Xreskus du Galatiai,
Teitus du Dalmatiai.
2TIM 4.11 Lukas ist miþ mis ains.
Marku andnimands brigg miþ þus silbin, unte ist mis bruks du andbahtja.
2TIM 4.12 aþþan Twkeiku insandida in Aifaison.
2TIM 4.13 hakul þanei bilaiþ in Trauadai at Karpau qimands atbair jah bokos, þishun maimbranans.
2TIM 4.14 Alaiksandrus aizasmiþa managa mis unþiuþa ustaiknida;
usgildiþ imma frauja bi waurstwam is;
2TIM 4.15 þammei jah þu witai,
filu auk andstoþ unsaraim waurdam.
2TIM 4.16 in frumiston meinai sunjonai ni manna mis miþwas.
ak allai mis biliþun,
ni rahnjaidau im...
TIT Incipit.0 Du Teitau anastodeiþ.

TIT 1.1 Pawlus, skalks gudis, iþ apaustaulus Iesuis Xristaus bi galaubeinai gawalidaize gudis jah ufkunþja sunjos sei bi gagudein ist, TIT 1.2 du wenai libainais aiweinons þoei gahaihait unliugands guþ faur mela aiweina, TIT 1.3 iþ ataugida mela swesamma waurd sein in mereinai, sei gatrauaida ist mis bi anabusnai nasjandis unsaris gudis, TIT 1.4 Teitau, walisin barna bi gamainjai galaubeinai,
ansts jah gawairþi fram guda attin jah Xristau Iesu nasjand unsaramma.

TIT 1.5 in þizozei waihtais bilaiþ þus in Kretai, in þize ei wanata atgaraihtjais jah gasatjais and baurgs praizbwtairein, swaswe ik þus garaidida, TIT 1.6 jabai ƕas ist ungafairinonds, ainaizos qenais aba, barna habands galaubeina, ni in usqissai usstiureins aiþþau ungaƕairba.
